Package tage.networking.server

Class ProtocolClient

java.lang.Object
tage.networking.AbstractGameConnection
tage.networking.client.AbstractGameConnectionClient
tage.networking.client.GameConnectionClient
tage.networking.server.ProtocolClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameConnectionClient, IGameConnection
public class ProtocolClient extends GameConnectionClient
Handles all network communication between the client and the server.

ProtocolClient is responsible for sending and receiving protocol-specific messages in a multiplayer environment. It interprets incoming messages such as avatar creation, movement updates, disconnections, and skybox changes, and performs the appropriate client-side actions.

Author:
YourName

  • Constructor Details

    • ProtocolClient

      public ProtocolClient(InetAddress remAddr, int remPort, IGameConnection.ProtocolType pType, MyGame game) throws IOException
      Constructs a ProtocolClient used for communicating with the server.
      Parameters:
      remAddr - The server's IP address.
      remPort - The port number the server is listening on.
      pType - The protocol type (UDP).
      game - The main game instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - if socket connection fails.

      Parameters:
      remId - The UUID of the remote client.
      pos - The position of this client's avatar.
